description: Code identifying the transmission model/type for a vehicle (often OEM model codes). Serves as the master key for transmission reference data used in specifications and reporting.
Human-readable description of the transmission, including make, series, speeds, and type; displayed to users in picklists and reports.
User ID or automated process that created the transmission master record; used for audit trail.
Timestamp when the transmission record was created in the system; timezone may be system default or UTC (confirm with SME).
User ID or process that last modified this transmission record; supports auditability.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the transmission record; likely stored in system time or UTC (confirm with SME).
